content: In this article, we have discussed the concept of precision farming on organic hydroponics in bamboo greenhouses with IoT and renewable energy for sustainability and circular economy. We have highlighted the benefits of using precision farming techniques in organic hydroponics, including increased crop yields, reduced costs, and minimized environmental impact. We also discussed how IoT and renewable energy can be used in precision farming to improve efficiency, reduce reliance on fossil fuels, and promote sustainability. Additionally, we have explored the importance of developing sustainable and circular economy practices in precision farming, and discussed the various tools and use cases for precision farming. We also discussed the key success factors and data success stories, as well as the potential for precision farming to improve food security and economic development in developing communities abroad. Finally, we touched on the importance of considering value chains and business models when implementing precision farming practices.
